definition: actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Life won't always turn out the way you want.
sentences.chinese: 生活并不总会如你所愿。

sentences.english: The key to following your heart is to learn to deal with fear.
sentences.chinese: 要做到心随所愿，秘诀在于学会克服恐惧。

sentences.english: If Detroit gets money, then everyone would have a case.
sentences.chinese: 如果底特律得偿所愿，那么每个人都会有一套说辞。

sentences.english: Releasing the heart wall could actually change your life as you know it.
sentences.chinese: 敞开心扉会如你所愿的真正改变你的人生。

sentences.english: As You Like It, you will eventually become one of cinnabar in my heart hemorrhoids.
sentences.chinese: 如你所愿，你终究成了一颗在我心头的朱砂痔。

sentences.english: All will happen as you want it, provided you really want it.
sentences.chinese: 一切将从心所愿，假设您真正地想要它。

sentences.english: So as I pray, unlimited blade works.
sentences.chinese: 所以，如我所愿，为无限的剑制。

sentences.english: Little do they hope but that their family should be safe.
sentences.chinese: 他们无所愿求，但望家人安全。

sentences.english: 4May he give you the desire of your heart and make all your plans succeed.
sentences.chinese: 将你心所愿的赐给你，成就你的一切筹算。

sentences.english: I am extraordinarily patient, provided I get my own way in the end.
sentences.chinese: 只要最后能随我所愿，我就会极有耐心。

sentences.english: Can result in recompenses is willing to like itself liking.
sentences.chinese: 能得偿所愿爱自己喜欢的。

sentences.english: The Sudeten Germans were returned to German rule, as they wished.
sentences.chinese: 苏台德的德意志人如他们所愿重归于德国治下。

sentences.english: You are trying to know what is happening as it is.
sentences.chinese: 不要试图令事物按你所愿发展，只需试图如实了知。

sentences.english: Her fervent prayers touched the heart of Buddha and so he appeared to grant her wish.
sentences.chinese: 她的至诚，感动了佛心，于是现身遂其所愿。

sentences.english: Nothing is impossible to a willing heart.
Actually this certainly is not I want.
sentences.chinese: 事实上这的确非我所愿。

definition: to expect/to presume/to think (sth is likely)
